message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $9,500. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I'm hoping to stay within my budget. Would you consider reducing the price to $8,500?
Hi Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal. I'm willing to come down a bit to $9,000. This is a very competitive price for a product of this quality.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I really appreciate it. Considering my budget, could you possibly lower the price to $8,800?
